Snipet.name: Delete button
Snipet.Description: Show a delete button in a table.

Snipet.name: Delete button (GCE140)
Snipet.Description: Show a delete button in a table (GCE140).

Snipet.name: Modifier
Snipet.Description: Sumbit a form. Show the label 'LBL.MODIFIER'
Snipet.Text: <input class="bouton" type="submit" value="{$LBL.MODIFIER}"/>

Snipet.name: Modifier (GCE140)
Snipet.Description: Sumbit a form. Show the label 'LBL.MODIFIER' (GCE140)
Snipet.Text: <input class="bouton" type="submit" value="{gnx:trad($LANGUAGE,'LBL.MODIFIER',$CTXTRD)}"/>

Snipet.name: Codzn
Snipet.Description: Template to manage Codzn.
Snipet.Text: <!-- Don't forget to import right xsl templates files <xsl:import href="langue/fra/e-GX.xsl"/> <xsl:import href="langue/fra/codzn_niveau2.xsl"/> <xsl:import href="langue/fra/nav/listes_valeurs.xsl"/> You may have to change min and max value !!! --> <xsl:call-template name="Codzn"> <xsl:with-param name="typzod" select="'%1'"/> <xsl:with-param name="numero" select="'1'"/> <xsl:with-param name="max" select="'16'"/> <xsl:with-param name="formulaire" select="'%2'"/> <xsl:with-param name="champ" select="'%3'"/> </xsl:call-template>

Snipet.name: GnxPopup
Snipet.Description: Display a link to another page.

Snipet.name: GnxSort
Snipet.Description: Template for sort a title with two sort key (to define in ViewStruct)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:call-template name="GnxSort"> <xsl:with-param name="title">%1</xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="sortkey_asc">%2</xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="sortkey_desc">-%2</xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="multisort">%3</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template>

Snipet.name: GnxSort (GCE140)
Snipet.Description: Template for column sorting with two sort key (to define in ViewStruct)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:call-template name="GnxSort"> <xsl:with-param name="title"> <xsl:value-of select="gnx:trad($LANGUAGE,'%1',$CTXTRD)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="sortkey_asc">%2</xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="sortkey_desc">-%2</xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="multisort">%3</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template>

Snipet.name: GnxTable
Snipet.Description: Template to manage page cinematics.

Snipet.name: Label
Snipet.Description: Create a variable in a XSL stylesheet. This variable is a label show in the page. To call this variable use the balise xsl:value-of and select the variable which the name is LBL.NAME.
Snipet.Text: <xsl:variable name="LBL.<?= "%1".replace(/[éèêë]/gi,'e').replace(/[à]/gi,'a').replace(/[îï]/gi,'i').replace(/[ù]/gi,'u').replace(/[ôö]/gi,'o').toUpperCase().replace(/\W/g, '') ?>">%1</xsl:variable>

Snipet.name: XSL code for a list
Snipet.Description: Display a list with header and detail tree for 2 columns
Snipet.Text: COD -COD true LIB -LIB

Snipet.name: Parameter from URL
Snipet.Description: Define a stylesheet parameter from an URL value (GCE140)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:param name="<?= '%1'.toUpperCase().replace(/\W/g, '')?>"> <xsl:value-of select="/layout_data/application_data/temporaire/param[@name='%1']/@value"/> </xsl:param>

Snipet.name: Url Parameter
Snipet.Description: Param passed by Url (post and get)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:value-of select="/layout_data/application_data/temporaire/param[@name='%1']/@value"/>

Snipet.name: Variable from PEV value (BusinessFlow)
Snipet.Description: Define a stylesheet variable from a PEV value (GCE140)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:variable name="PEV.%1"> <xsl:value-of select="/layout_data/businessFlow/PEV/general/%1/@value"/> </xsl:variable>

Snipet.name: Variable from PPE value (BusinessFlow)
Snipet.Description: Define a stylesheet variable from a PPE value (GCE140)
Snipet.Text: <xsl:variable name="PPE.%1"> <xsl:value-of select="/layout_data/businessFlow/PPE/parametre[@name='%1']/Para1/@value"/> </xsl:variable>

Snipet.name: Complete form
Snipet.Description: Complete form with mandatory hidden fields
Snipet.Text: <form action="{$SERVLET}" name="%3" method="post" onsubmit="return validform(this);"> <?= '%1' == '' ? '' : '<input type="hidden" name="sourceview" value="%1"/>' ?> <input type="hidden" name="cinematic" value="<?= ( '%1' == '' ) ? "propose(0);assimilate();" : "" ?>%2"/> <input type="hidden" name="entity" value="{$ENTITY}"/> <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{$ID}"/> <input type="hidden" name="frame" value="{$FRAME}"/> <form>

Snipet.name: Hidden fields
Snipet.Description: Hidden fields for GCE forms
Snipet.Text: <?= '%1' == '' ? '' : '<input type="hidden" name="sourceview" value="%1"/>' ?> <input type="hidden" name="cinematic" value="<?= ( '%1' == '' ) ? "propose(0);assimilate();" : "" ?>%2"/> <input type="hidden" name="entity" value="{$ENTITY}"/> <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{$ID}"/> <input type="hidden" name="frame" value="{$FRAME}"/>

Snipet.name: Input Uppercase
Snipet.Description: Add attribute for INPUT Uppercase
Snipet.Text: style="text-transform:uppercase;" onchange="this.value=this.value.toUpperCase()"

Snipet.name: Input field date into form
Snipet.Description: HTML and XSL according to date field

Snipet.name: Input field numeric (price) into form
Snipet.Description: HTML and XSL according to numeric field (price format)

Snipet.name: Input field numeric (quantity) into form
Snipet.Description: HTML and XSL according to numeric field (quantity format)

Snipet.name: Input text field into form
Snipet.Description: HTML and XSL according to text field

Snipet.name: Select box (LibOnly)
Snipet.Description: Present a select box with differente choice.
Snipet.Text: <select name="chp:%1" size="1"> <xsl:call-template name="ChpModifSelect"> <xsl:with-param name="Node" select="%1"/> <xsl:with-param name="NodeLib" select="%2"/> <xsl:with-param name="Mode" select="'LibOnly'"/> </xsl:call-template> <option/> <xsl:apply-templates select="%3"/> </select>

Snipet.name: Select field into form (eg. for TBL with BF provider)
Snipet.Description: HTML and XSL according to SELECT field populated by TBL BusinessFlow

Snipet.name: Base for GCE Stylesheet
Snipet.Description: Base used for GCE Stylesheet with e-Gx.xsl inclusion and habilitation test.
Snipet.Text:
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:import href="langue/fra/e-GX.xsl"/>
<xsl:template match="/"> <html> <xsl:call-template name="GnxHead"/> <body> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="/layout_data/VueUtilisateurCourantSociete/JUt_UtiView/JUt_UtiViewRow"> <xsl:apply-templates select="/layout_data/VueUtilisateurCourantSociete/JUt_UtiView/JUt_UtiViewRow"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:call-template name="GnxHabilitation"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </body> </html> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="JUt_UtiViewRow"> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

Snipet.name: Base for GCE Stylesheet (GCE140)
Snipet.Description: Base used for GCE Stylesheet with e-Gx.xsl inclusion and habilitation test (GCE140)
Snipet.Text:
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:gnx="http://www.oracle.com/XSL/Transform/java/fr.generix.technicalframework.application.translation.ParserTraduc" exclude-result-prefixes="gnx"> <xsl:import href="langue/fra/e-GX.xsl"/> <!-- Définition du nom de la feuille de style --> <xsl:variable name="CTXTRD">xxx.xsl</xsl:variable> <!-- Import des JS spécifiques à la page <--> <xsl:template match="/" mode="js"> <script type="text/javascript" src="../langue/fra/nav/js/xxx.js" charset="iso-8859-1"> </script> </xsl:template> <!-- Règle principale <--> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:comment> $RCSfile: xxx.xsl,v $ </xsl:comment> <html> <xsl:call-template name="GnxHead"/> <body> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="/layout_data/VueUtilisateurCourantSociete/JUt_UtiView/JUt_UtiViewRow"> <xsl:apply-templates select="/layout_data/VueUtilisateurCourantSociete/JUt_UtiView/JUt_UtiViewRow"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:call-template name="GnxHabilitation"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </body> </html> </xsl:template> <!-- Règle sur l'utilisateur <--> <xsl:template match="JUt_UtiViewRow">
</xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

Snipet.name: Ajouter un mouvement de stock
Snipet.Description: Ajouter un mouvement de stock a un contexte déjà créé.
Snipet.Text: %1 %2 %3 %4 %5

Snipet.name: Créer un évènement
Snipet.Description: Créer un évènement avec un seul poste (possibiliter d'en rajouter). La valorisation est incluse.
Snipet.Text:
%1 DEMO %2
%3 %4 %5 %6 %7

Snipet.name: Créer une action TIM
Snipet.Description: Création d'une action
Snipet.Text: <egx_ws> <bean_in> <CRUDManagercreateIn viewObjectName="JTimView" xmlns="http://www.generix.fr/technicalframework/businesscomponent/applicationmodule/common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.generix.fr/technicalframework/businesscomponent/applicationmodule/common CRUDManagercreateIn.xsd"> <row num="1"> <field name="Codsoc1" value="%1"/> <field name="Typtie" value="%2"/> <field name="Sigtie" value="%3"/> <field name="Typact" value="%4"/> <field name="Dat1" value="%5"/> </row> </CRUDManagercreateIn> </bean_in> </egx_ws>

Snipet.name: Interroger le stock
Snipet.Description: Permet d'interroger le stock pour un produit.
Snipet.Text: <egx_ws> <bean_in> <CRUDManagerretrieveIn viewObjectName="JDskAskView" xmlns="http://www.generix.fr/technicalframework/businesscomponent/applicationmodule/common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.generix.fr/technicalframework/businesscomponent/applicationmodule/common CRUDManagerretrieveIn.xsd"> <retrieve key="ONE"> <param num="1" value="%1"/> <param num="2" value="%2"/> <param num="3" value="%3"/> <param num="4" value="%4"/> </retrieve> </CRUDManagerretrieveIn> </bean_in> </egx_ws>
